price: Nagsabi [si Solomon]: “Titingin kami kung nagtotoo ka ba o ikaw ay naging kabilang sa mga sinungaling.
arabic: ۞ قَالَ سَنَنظُرُ أَصَدَقۡتَ أَمۡ كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰذِبِينَ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qāla sananẓuru aṣadaqta am kunta mina al-kādhibīna
